title: Updated Bontrager Flatline MTB Shoes protect your toes and breathe more freely
content:
Bontrager has updated their Flatline MTB Shoes for flat pedal riders, improving durability, breathability, and toe protection. The shoe retains the Vibram outsole seen on previous iterations but gets a highly perforated upper that gives the shoe a polka dot aesthetic and allows the wearerâ€™s feet to breathe.
